comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: In 1901: Leon F. Czolgosz, whose trial for the assassination of President McKinley will begin next Monday, was examined as to his sanity for one hour this afternoon by Dr. Carlos F. Macdonald of New York, the eminent alienist, who was for years the Chairman of the State Board of Lunacy Commissioners. Source: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A04E5DE1E39EF32A... I started a Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Frederick_MacDonald
